ValidationRule.description: If a PTN status is Closed, Resolution Codes must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), RecordType.Name = 'PGi-Parent Ticket (NOC)', ISPICKVAL (Status, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(Tracking_Type__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tracking Type, and Resolution Codes must be populated when a Parent Ticket (NOC) is closed. Please use the Close Case button to access required fields and properly close a PTN.
